body.name: Ulanzi MT-34 Extendable Pole Tripod Mini Tabletop Tripod Selfie Stick with 2 in 1 Phone Clamp, Travel Tripod for Phone 12 Canon G7X Mark III Sony ZV-1 RX100 VII A6600 Vloging Filmmaking Live Streaming
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 11 hrs 9 mins
features: 【2 in 1 Phone Clamp Design】: The tripod plate is 2 in 1 design. When folded, there are a 1/4" universal screw which could mount camera directly when folded. Also, when stretched, it can be used as a phone clamp. Clamp width from 58 to 98mm, fits most smartphones in the market.
【6-Stage Extension Range】: This mini tripod has a nice feature of being able to easily extend 6-stage(81.5cm) long. Only 26CM when folded, it's very convenient to carry around.
【360° Adjustable Ballhead】: The tripod ballhead is 360° Adjustable. Which allows you shooting from various angles. Supports horizontal and vertical video shooting.

【Multifunctional expansion】: Can connect to a variety of photography equipment like DSLR, compact vlog camera and SLR, and smartphone like iPhone 11 Pro Max XS Max X 8 7 Samsung Canon Nikon Sony Cameras.

【Various Scenes】: It can be used directly as a selfie blog handle grip. Can be used as a desktop tripod. It can be connected to a ring light for a tripod for live video broadcasting. Adapt to all types of surfaces to ensure the stability of live streaming.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MT-34 Multi-functional Extendable Tripod Portable & 360° Rotatable Selfie Stick Compatible with Camera/Smartphone / 6 Extension Heights / Rotatable Ball Head / Cold Shoe Extension stable selfie vlogging handle grip Adapt to all types of surfaces to ensure the stability of live streaming 6-stage stretch extension up to 81.5CM Can freely stretch the desired height according to different shooting scenes and create freely Lightweight and portable, flexible storage only 26CM when folded, it's very convenient to carry around Extension: Cold Shoe Adapter What is in the box: MT-34 camera tripod *1

Ulanzi MT-34 tripod adopts 2 in 1 design phone clip As phone clip: the clip range to 58-98mm, fits most smartphones like iphone 12 pixel samsung. As tripod plate: the universal 1/4“ screw are compatible with most cameras like zv-1 etc. Supports horizontal and vertical video shooting 360° horizontal Rotatable Ballhead and 90° vertical folded. Supports horizontal and vertical video shooting. Extension: Cold Shoe Adapter There's a cold shoe mount on top of phone clip, which allows you attach microphone or video light. Parameters Size: length : 260mm. diameter： 32mm. tripod mount wide: 73mm. Weight: 260g. Material: ABS Bearing Load : 1.5 kg Compatible phone width: 58-98mm *Data are all manual measurement and laboratory measurement, there are certain difference normally
Taking self-portrait video recording Perfect tripod for travel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Useful lightweight tripod with ok quality.
reviews.reviewText: Generally it's a good tripod. Extension is long enough to do vlog with a zv1, with stabilization cropping on. Only complaint is the build quality. It's very cheap plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall very nice but feels a little flimsy or unstable
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my Sony zv1 camera and when I use it as a selfie stick, the way the handle design just feels kind of like cheap and not quite designed properlyWhen I use it as a table tripod and I extended all the way it seems just a little bit wobbly like I'm like I don't know if I should be sitting my camera on this thing, it seems like it could probably tip over a little bit easy but at the same time it feels sturdy enough, it's just kind of right on the edge of been good enough and kind of iffy.Overall I think this is a nice product but it could have been made a little bit better, build quality just feels so so but it definitely does the job,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great For the Price but Best For Small/Light Cameras
reviews.reviewText: Overall, I think this is a great buy because of the price, but I should’ve known that it would be light and therefore I would struggle to balance my camera on the tripod. I have a Sony a 7C, which isn’t too heavy when I use my tiny prime lens I have, but when I shoot vertical videos which involves flipping the camera over the tripod struggles to stay balanced, and I have to have something weighing down one of the legs down. This is especially the case when I have a light and microphone attached to the camera. I like though that you can have full control to move the camera at any angle you may need. I think that the Sony brand mini tripod doesn’t have full flexibility and for the price it just didn’t seem worth it to me which is why I ended up buying this one.This is pretty easy to open up and close the legs. I can easily hold the tripod to film when the legs are closed together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just right for GoPro or small point n shoot
reviews.reviewText: Light weight good length for vlogging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small, versatile but not as sturdy as I expected it to be
reviews.reviewText: It's nicely small. Head is OK. I put a GoPro Hero 5 on it. Put it down and the camera settles / moves for a few seconds - seems mostly the feets that are settling in position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth The Price, Useful in many different situations
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Has proven it's self useful to me so far, worth adding to your tool belt as a content creator

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I wish it was taller but it does the job and is extremely sturdy, which is what is most important when holding and expensive canon camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great little Tripod.
reviews.reviewText: I took a chance on this aquizition as the product discripitions can be too generous.This little Tripod, hits a home run.
Se siente de buen material, firme, robusto y de buen tamaño. Una excelente compra 🙌🏻
Je l'ai acheté pour partir en vacances et y accrocher mon appareil photo. Je l'ai juste testé, à l'air de faire son job.

Really good stand for my webcam. Use it with my obsbot tiny. Haven't tried it with heavier things, but for my use it is really good!If you extend it fully and put something heavy on top my guess it will be a bit unstable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My camera weights just over 900g. considered a small model. Unlike how it’s advertised, this product doesn’t support a device this weight. The legs get so stretched and bend with too much pressure. The worst thing is it toppled over so totally useless for my purpose. I had to return.
